Case program group

Source: R/data.R
rep_group.Rd

Representative case study. Six-digit CIP codes and custom program names for Civil, Electrical, Industrial, and Mechanical Engineering programs in midfielddata.

rep_group

Format

data.table with 12 rows and 2 columns keyed by the 6-digit CIP code. The variables are:

cip6

6-digit program code

program

program name assigned for grouping, summarizing, and joining

See also

Other example_data: rep_cip, rep_ever, rep_stickiness_mw, rep_stickiness

Examples

library(midfielddata)

# attributes of students matriculating in programs
cips_we_want <- rep_group$cip6
rows_we_want <- midfieldstudents$cip6 %in% cips_we_want
matriculants <- midfieldstudents[rows_we_want]
str(matriculants)
#> Classes 'data.table' and 'data.frame':	5026 obs. of  15 variables:
#>  $ id            : chr  "MID25792087" "MID25796088" "MID25799551" "MID25799578" ...
#>  $ institution   : chr  "Institution M" "Institution M" "Institution M" "Institution M" ...
#>  $ cip6          : chr  "141901" "140801" "141001" "141001" ...
#>  $ term_enter    : num  19961 19943 20031 20031 19971 ...
#>  $ transfer      : chr  "Y" "Y" "Y" "Y" ...
#>  $ hours_transfer: num  NA NA NA NA NA NA NA NA NA NA ...
#>  $ sex           : chr  "Female" "Male" "Male" "Male" ...
#>  $ race          : chr  "Asian" "White" "White" "White" ...
#>  $ age           : num  20 18 22 20 19 19 18 19 20 21 ...
#>  $ us_citizen    : chr  "Y" "Y" "Y" "Y" ...
#>  $ home_zip      : chr  "29503" "29607" "29631" "29625" ...

# attributes of students graduating in programs
cips_we_want <- rep_group$cip6
rows_we_want <- midfielddegrees$cip6 %in% cips_we_want
graduates <- midfielddegrees[rows_we_want]
str(graduates)
#> Classes 'data.table' and 'data.frame':	4676 obs. of  5 variables:
#>  $ id         : chr  "MID25783178" "MID25783197" "MID25783441" "MID25783491" ...
#>  $ institution: chr  "Institution M" "Institution M" "Institution M" "Institution M" ...
#>  $ cip6       : chr  "143501" "140801" "140801" "141001" ...
